summary: Completed comprehensive testing of YOLOv8-based object detection and driver assistance system. Backend APIs are mostly functional with image and frame detection working perfectly. Frontend UI is fully functional with successful image upload, detection results display, and responsive design. Core object detection pipeline is working end-to-end.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error with 'No such file or directory' for temporary video file handling

passed_tests: Homepage loads with GPS coordinates displayed
Three mode tabs (Live Camera, Image, Video) are present and functional
Image upload successfully processes and displays detection results
YOLOv8 model detects objects correctly with bounding boxes and labels
Detection results table shows object, confidence, and distance
Responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile
No JavaScript errors or UI issues found
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix video detection endpoint temporary file handling issue in /api/detect/video. The error suggests the temporary file path is not being created properly before video processing.
